channel.title: R-squared on Blogs of Kai
channel.description: Recent content in R-squared on Blogs of Kai

item.title: Multiple Regression Analysis: Use Adjusted R-Squared and Predicted R-Squared to Include the Correct Number of Variables
item.description: This blog looks at why you should resist the urge to add too many predictors to a regression model, and how the adjusted R-squared and predicted R-squared can help!

item.title: R-squared Shrinkage and Power and Sample Size Guidelines for Regression Analysis
item.description: This blog looks at how to obtain an unbiased and reasonably precise estimate of the population R-squared. It also presents power and sample size guidelines for regression analysis.

item.title: Regression analysis: How do I interpret R-squared and assess the Goodness-of-Fit?
item.description: Low R-squared values are not always bad and high R-squared values are not always good!

item.title: How to Interpret a Regression Model with Low R-squared and Low P values
item.description: What if your regression model has significant variables but explains little of the variability? With low P values and a low R-squared.
